dict.string: Copyright 2008 Kosada Incorporated. All rights reserved.

This patch renders a series of Cubes specified by the Input Point structure.
The Input Points structure should contain a series of 3-element structures, one for each point. Points can be specified as either the first three array elements ([0], [1], and [2]), or capitalized named values ('X', 'Y', and 'Z').
http://kineme.net/

A structure containing a series of 3-element structures, one for each point. Points can be specified as either the first three array elements ([0], [1], and [2]), or capitalized named values ('X', 'Y', and 'Z').
